name: element-finder
description: Find in HTML files with CSS selectors

excludeVcsIgnoredFiles.title: Exclude VCS Ignored Files
excludeVcsIgnoredFiles.description: Don't search through files and directories ignored by the current project's VCS (version control system). For example, projects using Git have these paths defined in their `.gitignore` file.

excludeIgnoredNames.description: Don't search through items matched by the `Ignored Names` core config setting.

filePatterns.title: File Patterns
filePatterns.description: List of string glob patterns for files to search in.
